summary.para: Registers a stream configuration, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.

param.name: ullStreamMask
param.para: A bitmask value where the bits that are on represent the indices of the substreams that are included in the stream configuration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The specified configuration is already registered.
The supplied bitmask has bits set that are invalid for the media source.
There is insufficient memory to complete the operation.

remarks.para: Stream configurations are ordered within the by the numeric value of the bitmask.

summary.para: Gets the of the substream with the specified index.

param.name: dwMuxStreamIndex
param.para: The index of the substream for which the media type is retrieved.

param.name: ppMediaType
param.para: The media type of the substream with the specified index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The stream specified substream index is invalid. Call to get the number of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.
The media type of the specified substream is invalid.

summary.para: Gets the stream configuration with the specified index, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.

param.name: ulIndex
param.para: The index of the configuration to retrieve.

param.name: pullStreamMask
param.para: The index of the configuration to retrieve.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The specified configuration index is not valid.

remarks.para: Stream configurations are ordered within the by the numeric value of the bitmask.

summary.para: Gets the count of registered stream configurations, which define set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.

param.name: pdwCount
param.para: The number of registered stream configurations.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Gets the count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.

param.name: pdwMuxStreamCount
param.para: The count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Unregisters a stream configuration, which defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.

param.name: ullStreamMask
param.para: A bitmask value where the bits that are on represent the indices of the substreams that are included in the stream configuration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The specified configuration is not currently registered.
There is insufficient memory to complete the operation.

summary.para: Enables the management of stream configurations for a multiplexed media source. A stream configuration defines a set of substreams that can be included the multiplexed output.
